paper_abstract: For a (molecular) graph, the multiplicative Zagreb indices Pi(1)-index and Pi(2)-index are multiplicative versions of the ordinary Zagreb indices (M-1-index and M-2-index). In this note we report several sharp upper bounds for Pi(1)-index in terms of graph parameters including the order, size, radius, Wiener index and eccentric distance sum, and upper bounds for Pi(2)-index in terms of graph parameters including the order, size, the first Zagreb index, the first Zagreb coindex and degree distance.
paper_title: Sharp Upper Bounds for Multiplicative Zagreb Indices
